entries.content: Starting refactor of temp/spinners.html - a single monolithic file with 6 different spinner animations. Task: isolate each spinner into separate folders with individual HTML and CSS files for better modularity and reusability.

Successfully completed ultra-modular refactoring of spinners.html. Created organized folder structure with:
- 6 isolated spinner components (particle-explosion, dna-helix, quantum-tunnel, liquid-morph, neural-network, holographic)
- Each spinner has its own folder with dedicated HTML + CSS files
- Shared base.css for common styling (backgrounds, animations, card styles)
- Shared claude-icon.svg for reusability
- Main index.html showcasing all spinners with iframe previews and links
This follows our ultra-modular pattern - maximum separation of concerns and reusability.
Adding toggle button to each spinner to remove backgrounds and isolate just the spinner animation for clean preview/export mode.

Added "ISOLATE SPINNER" toggle button to all 6 spinner HTML files. Button removes backgrounds, cards, titles, and text - leaving only the pure spinner animation. Perfect for clean preview/export or integration into other UIs. Button changes to "SHOW ALL" when activated with different gradient color.
Creating landing.html - a welcome page with centered large Claude SVG (non-animated) and "Welcome to Sementix" text below. Simple, clean landing page design.

Created landing.html - beautiful welcome page with large centered Claude SVG (300px, non-animated) and gradient "WELCOME TO SEMENTIX" text. Includes animated background gradients and grid pattern for visual appeal, with hover effect on SVG. Fully responsive design.
Planning 2 new ultra-modern spinners featuring Claude SVG with creative animations. Will match quality/complexity of existing 6 spinners, use same color palette, and follow ultra-modular structure.

Created 2 new ultra-modern spinners featuring Claude SVG:

1. Orbital Rings - 4 concentric rings orbiting in 3D space at different speeds/angles with pulsing opacity. Each ring has different color (orange/purple/blue/pink). Claude SVG rotates slowly in reverse direction with color-shifting glow.

2. Energy Pulse - 4 rippling energy waves emanating from Claude SVG like radar pulses. Waves scale from 0 to 3x with opacity fade. Claude SVG pulses in sync with waves, changing colors with each pulse.

Both spinners follow ultra-modular pattern, include isolation toggle, animated text rotation, and are integrated into main index.html. Collection now has 8 spinners total.
